metadata.description: Foundation Words Part 8 - Enhanced with Engagement Features
metadata.pedagogical_focus: Emotion and relationship words with consonant blends and digraphs
metadata.builds_on: Chunks 1-7 foundation patterns, adding social-emotional vocabulary

words.meaning_support: A facial expression when you're sad, worried, or concentrating hard
words.context_introduction: A facial expression that shows when someone feels sad or is thinking really hard. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya's FROWN quickly turned into a smile when she figured out the puzzle!
words.personal_connection_question: Do you frown when you're concentrating hard on something tricky?
words.story_connection: Characters' FROWN expressions show when they're facing challenges!
words.celebration_message: Great job! FROWN has 'fr' blend and 'ow' diphthong working together!

words.meaning_support: Moving in a smooth, beautiful, and elegant way
words.context_introduction: Moving in a smooth, beautiful way, like a dancer or a swan on water. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: The ballet dancer moved with perfect GRACE across the stage!
words.personal_connection_question: What moves with grace that you find beautiful to watch?
words.story_connection: Magical creatures often move with amazing GRACE in fairy tales!
words.celebration_message: Perfect! GRACE has 'gr' blend and magic 'e'!

words.meaning_support: Became bigger, older, or more mature over time
words.context_introduction: When something has become bigger, stronger, or more mature over time. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: The tiny seedling had GROWN into a magnificent oak tree over the years!
words.personal_connection_question: How have you grown or changed in the past year?
words.story_connection: Characters feel proud when they see how much they've GROWN!
words.celebration_message: Excellent! GROWN has 'gr' blend and 'ow' diphthong!

words.meaning_support: Very impressive, large, or wonderful in a special way
words.context_introduction: Something very impressive and wonderful that makes you feel amazed. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya felt the GRAND adventure was the best experience of her entire life!
words.personal_connection_question: What's the most grand or impressive thing you've ever seen?
words.story_connection: Heroes go on GRAND adventures that change their lives!
words.celebration_message: Awesome! GRAND has 'gr' blend and ends with 'nd' blend!

words.meaning_support: Something valuable you win or earn for doing well
words.context_introduction: Something special and valuable you receive for doing your best. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Sam's biggest PRIZE was the friendship he made during the nature competition!
words.personal_connection_question: What's the best prize you ever won or earned?
words.story_connection: Characters often discover the real PRIZE is friendship and learning!
words.celebration_message: Great! PRIZE has 'pr' blend and magic 'e'!

words.meaning_support: To make words or pictures appear on paper
words.context_introduction: To make words or pictures appear clearly on paper or screens. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya learned to PRINT her nature journal stories in neat, clear letters!
words.personal_connection_question: Do you like to print letters neatly or prefer typing on computers?
words.story_connection: Characters PRINT important maps and clues for their adventures!
words.celebration_message: Perfect! PRINT has 'pr' blend and 'nt' blend working together!

words.meaning_support: Feeling really good about something you accomplished
words.context_introduction: The wonderful feeling you get when you accomplish something meaningful. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya felt PROUD when she helped the lost kitten find its way back home!
words.personal_connection_question: What achievement makes you feel most proud?
words.story_connection: Characters feel PROUD when they help others or overcome challenges!
words.celebration_message: Excellent! PROUD has 'pr' blend and 'ou' diphthong!

words.meaning_support: A path or trail, or to follow someone's footsteps
words.context_introduction: A path through the woods, or following footprints to see where someone went. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Sam followed the deer TRACK through the forest to find their secret meadow!
words.personal_connection_question: Have you ever followed animal tracks? Where did they lead?
words.story_connection: Characters follow mysterious TRACK clues to solve adventures!
words.celebration_message: Great job! TRACK has 'tr' blend and 'ck' ending sound!

words.meaning_support: To give something you have to get something someone else has
words.context_introduction: When you give something you have to get something someone else has. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya decided to TRADE her extra colored pencils for Sam's interesting rock collection!
words.personal_connection_question: What would you like to trade with a friend?
words.story_connection: Characters TRADE items that help each other on their quests!
words.celebration_message: Perfect! TRADE has 'tr' blend and magic 'e'!

words.meaning_support: A clever way to do something or a fun surprise
words.context_introduction: A clever, fun way to surprise someone or solve a puzzle. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Sam learned a magic TRICK to make coins disappear and reappear behind Maya's ear!
words.personal_connection_question: Do you know any magic tricks or clever ways to solve problems?
words.story_connection: Characters use clever TRICK solutions to outsmart villains!
words.celebration_message: Awesome! TRICK has 'tr' blend and 'ck' ending!

words.meaning_support: Believing someone will keep their promises and do right
words.context_introduction: When you believe someone will keep promises and always try to do what's right. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya knew she could TRUST Sam to keep their secret hideout location safe!
words.personal_connection_question: Who do you trust most in your life? What makes them trustworthy?
words.story_connection: Characters learn to TRUST each other through shared adventures!
words.celebration_message: Excellent! TRUST has 'tr' blend and 'st' blend - lots of consonant teamwork!

words.meaning_support: A piece of furniture with four legs that you sit on
words.context_introduction: A comfortable piece of furniture with a back where you can sit and relax. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya curled up in her favorite reading CHAIR by the sunny window!
words.personal_connection_question: Where's your favorite place to sit when you want to be comfortable?
words.story_connection: Magical CHAIR furniture sometimes takes characters on unexpected journeys!
words.celebration_message: Great! CHAIR has 'ch' digraph and 'air' vowel team!

words.meaning_support: To look at something carefully to make sure it's right
words.context_introduction: When you look at something really carefully to make sure everything is just right. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Sam always liked to CHECK his backpack twice before starting any adventure!
words.personal_connection_question: What do you like to check to make sure it's perfect?
words.story_connection: Careful characters CHECK their maps and supplies before big quests!
words.celebration_message: Perfect! CHECK has 'ch' digraph and 'ck' ending sound!

words.meaning_support: A delicious yellow or white food made from milk
words.context_introduction: A tasty food made from milk that's perfect for sandwiches and snacks. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya packed her favorite CHEESE sandwiches for their all-day hiking adventure!
words.personal_connection_question: Do you like cheese on sandwiches or prefer it by itself?
words.story_connection: Characters pack CHEESE for energy during long adventure journeys!
words.celebration_message: Awesome! CHEESE has 'ch' digraph and 'ee' vowel team!

words.meaning_support: A small, round, sweet red fruit that grows on trees
words.context_introduction: A small, perfectly round fruit that's bright red and grows on beautiful trees. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya climbed the CHERRY tree to pick the ripest, reddest fruit she could find!
words.personal_connection_question: Have you ever picked cherries or eaten them fresh from a tree?
words.story_connection: CHERRY trees often mark special magical places in fairy tales!
words.celebration_message: Great job! CHERRY has 'ch' digraph and two syllables: 'cher-ry'!

words.meaning_support: A young person who is still growing and learning
words.context_introduction: A young person who is still growing, learning, and discovering the world. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Every CHILD in the neighborhood loved exploring the mysterious forest together!
words.personal_connection_question: What's your favorite thing about being a child and learning new things?
words.story_connection: Brave CHILD characters often become the heroes of the best stories!
words.celebration_message: Excellent! CHILD has 'ch' digraph and 'ild' pattern!

words.meaning_support: To pick one thing from several different options
words.context_introduction: When you pick exactly what you want from lots of different options. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya had to CHOOSE between exploring the cave or climbing the tall oak tree!
words.personal_connection_question: What's a choice you had to make recently? How did you decide?
words.story_connection: Characters must CHOOSE the right path to reach their adventure goals!
words.celebration_message: Perfect! CHOOSE has 'ch' digraph and 'oo' vowel team!

words.meaning_support: The form something has, like round, square, or triangle
words.context_introduction: The special form something has, like a circle, square, or star. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya noticed the interesting SHAPE of the cloud looked exactly like a dragon!
words.personal_connection_question: What shapes do you see in clouds or interesting objects around you?
words.story_connection: Characters discover that mysterious SHAPE clues lead to treasure!
words.celebration_message: Awesome! SHAPE has 'sh' digraph and magic 'e'!

words.meaning_support: To let others use or enjoy some of your special things
words.context_introduction: When you let friends use or enjoy some of your favorite things. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya was always happy to SHARE her discovery treasures with Sam!
words.personal_connection_question: What's something special you like to share with friends?
words.story_connection: Characters who SHARE with others always make the best friends!
words.celebration_message: Great! SHARE has 'sh' digraph and magic 'e'!

words.meaning_support: Having a pointed edge, or being very clear and focused
words.context_introduction: Having a pointed edge that can cut, or being very clear and smart. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Sam had SHARP eyes that could spot tiny details other people missed!
words.personal_connection_question: What are you sharp at noticing that others might miss?
words.story_connection: Characters with SHARP observation skills solve the trickiest mysteries!
words.celebration_message: Perfect! SHARP has 'sh' digraph and 'ar' controlled by 'r'!
